parameters.content:
## âš¡ WORKFLOW UPDATED WITH LINKFINDER AI âš¡

This workflow has been optimized by replacing 2 nodes with LinkFinder AI services for better performance and reliability.

### Replaced Services:
- **Scrape LinkedIn Profile** â†’ LinkFinder AI linkedin_profile_to_linkedin_info
- **Find Email with Hunter.io** â†’ LinkFinder AI company_name_to_email

### Setup Instructions:
1. **Get your API key:** https://linkfinderai.com/?ref=reddit
2. **Replace ALL instances of {api_key_here}** with your actual API key in the LinkFinder AI nodes
3. Test the workflow with 2-3 sample LinkedIn URLs
4. Update Google Sheets ID in the final node

### LinkFinder AI Services Used:
- **linkedin_profile_to_linkedin_info** - Extracts comprehensive LinkedIn profile data
- **company_name_to_email** - Finds verified company email addresses

---

## ðŸŽ¯ LinkedIn Lead Enrichment with AI Personalization

### **Who's it for:**
Sales teams, growth marketers, and business development professionals who want to automate lead research and create personalized outreach at scale.

### **What it does:**
- âœ… Scrapes LinkedIn profiles using LinkFinder AI (UPGRADED)
- âœ… Enriches leads with emails using LinkFinder AI (UPGRADED)
- Generates personalized outreach messages using AI
- Stores enriched data in Google Sheets

### **Requirements:**
- **LinkFinder AI API key** (get at https://linkfinderai.com/?ref=reddit)
- OpenAI API key (GPT-4 recommended)
- Google Sheets access
- LinkedIn profile URLs of target leads

### **Key Improvements:**
- More reliable LinkedIn scraping with LinkFinder AI
- Better email finding with higher accuracy
- Simplified workflow with fewer dependencies
- No need for Hunter.io or custom scrapers

ðŸ’¡ **Pro Tip:** LinkFinder AI handles rate limiting automatically, so you can process leads faster.

ðŸ“º **Watch Setup Guide:** [Add your Loom video link here]

## Step 1: Configure Your Campaign

Set your target criteria and personalization variables here.

This makes it easy to update without touching other nodes.

## Step 2: Extract LinkedIn Data

âš¡ UPGRADED: Now using LinkFinder AI for more reliable profile scraping.

No rate limits - process profiles faster!

## Step 3: Find Email Addresses

âš¡ UPGRADED: Using LinkFinder AI for verified email finding.

Higher accuracy than Hunter.io with better deliverability.

## Step 4: AI Personalization

Generate custom outreach messages based on:
- Job title
- Company info
- Recent activity
- Your value proposition

## Step 5: Store Enriched Leads

Save all enriched data to Google Sheets for review and outreach.

nodes.name: LinkFinder AI - Scrape LinkedIn Profile
nodes.notes:
REPLACED: Custom HTTP Request LinkedIn scraper
Service: linkedin_profile_to_linkedin_info
Purpose: Extracts comprehensive LinkedIn profile data including name, title, company, location, and more
API Key: Get yours at https://linkfinderai.com/?ref=reddit

nodes.name: LinkFinder AI - Find Company Email
nodes.notes:
REPLACED: Hunter.io email finder
Service: company_name_to_email
Purpose: Finds verified company email addresses with high accuracy
API Key: Get yours at https://linkfinderai.com/?ref=reddit
